mapper.insert: insert into boardattach (uuid, uploadPath, fileName, filetype, bno) values (#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{bno})
mapper.select: select UUID ,UPLOADPATH ,FILENAME ,FILETYPE ,BNO ,REPLACE(FILENAME, UUID||'_') REALFILENAME from boardattach where bno = #{bno}
select * from boardattach where uploadpath = to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy\mm\dd')
